title: Spice container
description: outdoor scene with house, windmill with removable top and movable vanes, woman with dog feeding chickens, 2 men fishing, man in a horse-drawn cart and 3 other figures
provenance: (Moriah Galleries, New York); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased 1983; Gift to the MIA in 2002.
creditline: Gift of Mickey and Harold Smith
